steps.title: Lightly draw an oval for the guideline of the object.
steps.content: Lightly draw an oval for the guideline of the object. Follow the shape of the vase or picture. You may want to the bottom a little flatter, the bottom half of an ellipse. Read about how to draw a cylinder for more information on getting the perspective right for the top and bottom edges of the vase.

steps.title: Now, pressing harder, draw the rim and the rest of the outline, trying to make it look as smooth as possible.
steps.content: Now, pressing harder, draw the rim and the rest of the outline, trying to make it look as smooth as possible.

steps.title: Erase the excess lines or construction lines from the first step.
